content.raw:
I'm responding to the inline comment thread here since the thread was getting long:

This pull request is currently just a quick band-aid that could make Jenkins a little quieter. There's some good discussion about the right way to fix the problem, but @jacquelinekay 's proposal wouldn't catch all the error messages. I think @caguero 's idea to pass an optional string for the name of the log file could be interesting, but is starting to get complicated.

Given that we are in Feature Freeze, I would lean towards the simple band aid now and allow time for a better solution to be found and vetted.
content.html:
I'm responding to the inline comment thread here since the thread was getting long:

This pull request is currently just a quick band-aid that could make Jenkins a little quieter. There's some good discussion about the right way to fix the problem, but @jacquelinekay 's proposal wouldn't catch all the error messages. I think @caguero 's idea to pass an optional string for the name of the log file could be interesting, but is starting to get complicated.

Given that we are in Feature Freeze, I would lean towards the simple band aid now and allow time for a better solution to be found and vetted.
